document.full_text: hundreds of saudi shi'ites staged peaceful protests in the kingdom's oil-producing east on friday in support of shi'ites in bahrain and political freedoms at home, activists said.
document.title: saudi shi'ites protest peacefully in east
lines_and_colors: hundreds of saudi shi'ites staged peaceful protests in the kingdom's oil-producing east on friday in support of shi'ites in bahrain and political freedoms at home, activists said.
